title.rendered: Rancocas Anesthesiology Revels in Benefits of Regional Anesthesia

content.rendered:
Dr. Anish Doshi

Rancocas Anesthesiology Revels in Benefits of Regional Anesthesia

VOORHEES, NJ, UNITED STATES, August 23, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Anesthesiologists at Rancocas Anesthesiology have noticed an uptick in requests for regional anesthesia as opposed to the more traditional general anesthesia. Regional anesthesia is an anesthesia technique where a body part involved in a surgical procedure can be anesthetized usually with ultrasound guided nerve blocks. This can provide significant pain control for the patient during and after the surgical procedure.

The primary benefit is its lack of narcotics, which has become a point of interest amid the ongoing opioid epidemic and issues with drug dependency. As a result, more patients are requesting little-to-no narcotics in treatment.

“Not only does regional anesthesia offer precise and targeted pain relief and enhance patient comfort during surgical procedures, but it also champions a brighter tomorrow by actively reducing our reliance on opioids,” said Anish Doshi, M.D. at Rancocas Anesthesiology. “In the midst of a nationwide drug epidemic, regional anesthesia emerges as a beacon of hope, playing a pivotal role in alleviating pain without the dangerous repercussions of opioid dependence or addiction.”

Dr. Doshi is hopeful that as recognition rises about safer alternatives to anesthesia, people in need of serious medical procedures will be inclined to proceed knowing they’ll remain pain-free. “By embracing regional anesthesia, we take a significant step towards a safer and healthier future for all.”

The Benefits of Regional Anesthesia:

Enhanced Patient Comfort: By precisely targeting the affected area, regional anesthesia minimizes pain during and after surgery, leading to a more pleasant patient experience.

Reduced Risk and Side Effects: Regional anesthesia carries a lower risk profile compared to general anesthesia, minimizing the potential for complications and side effects such as nausea and grogginess.

Faster Recovery: Our skilled anesthesiologists’ proficiency in regional anesthesia leads to shorter recovery times, allowing patients to return to their daily activities sooner.

Optimized Surgical Outcomes: By providing exceptional pain management, regional anesthesia enables surgeons to perform with greater precision and accuracy, contributing to improved surgical outcomes.

Tailored Approach: At Rancocas Anesthesiology, we recognize that each patient is unique. Our anesthesiologists meticulously customize regional anesthesia plans to suit individual needs, ensuring personalized care for every patient.

About Rancocas Anesthesiology:

Celebrate the Power of Precision and Compassion. At Rancocas Anesthesiology, our team of board-certified anesthesiologists boasts extensive experience and training in administering regional anesthesia techniques, guided by state-of-the-art equipment and the latest advances in medical innovation. We work together with surgeons, fostering seamless teamwork to optimize the patient’s surgical journey. Experience the benefits of tailored pain relief and faster recovery. Trust in our mastery, as we pave the way for superior surgical outcomes and assure the highest level of care, one nerve at a time.

https://www.rancocasanes.com/

Mindie Barnett
MB and Associates Public Relations
+1 609-923-1639
email us here
